welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Edenbridge, a charming town known for its picturesque countryside and historic landmarks. We hope you enjoy your stay and take time to discover all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome offers a range of amenities for travelers, including a cafe, gift shop, and car rental services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the oldest terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45-minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The primary terminal for all commercial flights at Northolt Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private and charter flights at Northolt Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
